structure.unit: B LICENSURE AND REGULATION OF HEALTH FACILITIES AND SERVICES

law.catch_line: Requirement for a care delivery model based on patient needs for licensed health care facilities and services.
law.history: Amended 2001 Ky. Acts ch. 36, sec. 2, effective June 21, 2001. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 96, sec. 2, effective July 14, 2000; and ch. 538, sec. 2, effective July 14, 2000. -- Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 384, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1998.
